name: Protosynthesis
description: This pokemon is especially comfortable when somewhere similar to it's old hot environment.
effect: If Sunny Weather or Grassy Terrain are active or this pokemon is holding Booster Energy, Increase the base of the User's highest Stat by 1 (In case of ties, select randomly between the mon's highest stats. If the User's highest stat is Vitality or Insight increase the User's Defense or Special Defense respectively). If the User's highest stat is Dexterity, instead increase the base stat by 2.
